property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.authenticators
property.description: A comma separated list of authentications names. Each item in the list must be a login module. These authenticators compose an authentication chain, the ordering of the list defines the ordering of the authentications. 'ldap', 'kerberos' are supported.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.authenticator.ldap.controlflag
property.description: Java login module control flag for LDAP authenticator. The value can be one of 'required', 'requisite', 'sufficient', 'optional'

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.ldap.ssl
property.description: Whether the ldap server enables ssl

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.ldap.ssl.keystore.password
property.description: password of keystore for ldap ssl

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.ldap.query.attrs
property.description: A comma separated list of attributes names. These attributes will be retrieved after authentication.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.identity.server.keytab
property.description: Identity server keytab for there is kerberos login module.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.identity.server.principal
property.description: Identity server principal for there is kerberos login module.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.identity.server.http.keytab
property.description: Identity server http keytab for there is kerberos login module.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.identity.server.http.principal
property.description: Identity server http principal for there is kerberos login module.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.secretsmanager.keystore.secret.file
property.description: The password file of keystore to save secrets.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.authorization.server.principal
property.description: authorization server principal for token auth.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.authorization.server.authentication.file
property.description: authorization server authentication file for token auth.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.identity.token.encrypted
property.description: whether the identity token should be encrypted.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.access.token.encrypted
property.description: whether the authorization token should be encrypted.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.identity.token.max.renew.time
property.description: max renewable time of identity token.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.identity.token.expires
property.description: identity token expires time, in millisecond.

property.name: hadoop.security.tokenauth.access.token.expires
property.description: access token expires time, in millisecond.
